sn26.10:1.2: “Yo kho, bhikkhave, rupassa uppado thiti abhinibbatti patubhavo, dukkhasseso uppado, roganam thiti, jaramaranassa patubhavo.
sn26.10:1.6: yo vinnanassa uppado thiti abhinibbatti patubhavo, dukkhasseso uppado, roganam thiti, jaramaranassa patubhavo.
sn26.10:1.7: Yo ca kho, bhikkhave, rupassa nirodho vupasamo atthangamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, roganam vupasamo, jaramaranassa atthangamo.
sn26.10:1.11: yo vinnanassa nirodho vupasamo atthangamo, dukkhasseso nirodho, roganam vupasamo, jaramaranassa atthangamo”ti.
